item.title: WireGuard Setup on Pfsense
item.description:
In this post I will explain how to setup WireGuard on your pfsense router. Your pfsense router will be the WireGuard server and I’ll show a couple example client configurations at the end.

Installing WireGuard on pfsense

  • pfsense version 2.5.2
  • WireGuard version 0.1.5

Navigate to System > Package Manager > Available Packages

Search for WireGuard and Install.

Configuring WireGuard Server

Create Tunnel

Navigate to VPN > WireGuard

Create a tunnel by clicking Add Tunnel
